description.narrative: Funding under this investment provides support to the Asia Foundation (TAF) to implement a flexible two-year project "Strengthening the Australia-ASEAN Partnership: Regional Capacity and Policy Dialogues". The project will support DFAT's objectives to broaden its support to ASEAN on security cooperation, with particular focus on maritime and cyber security, and to strengthen ASEAN's capacity for policy dialogue and regional cooperation. The project will enable DFAT to provide flexible support to ASEAN bodies and complementary efforts involving relevant ASEAN stakeholders under the ASEAN-Australia Strategic Partnership and priority areas identified at the Australia-ASEAN Special Summit 2018. The total value of this investment is $2.0 million to be expensed in the 2018-19 financial year.
